tool_description: US and state flag half-staff events in JSON format.
title: Flag Status

api_list.name: Get half-staff events for given flag
api_list.description: Get all half-staff events for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/events/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What are the half-staff events for the flag in California?
Can you provide the half-staff events for the Texas flag?
List all half-staff events for the New York flag.
Show me the half-staff events for the Florida flag.
What are the upcoming half-staff events for the Illinois flag?
Get the half-staff events for the Pennsylvania flag.
I need to know the half-staff events for the Ohio flag.
Provide the half-staff events for the Michigan flag.
What are the half-staff events for the Georgia flag?
Can you tell me the half-staff events for the Virginia flag?

api_list.name: Get current status for given flag
api_list.description: Get the current status for the provided flag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/status/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all half-staff events for every flag
api_list.description: Get every half-staff event for the last 365 days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flag-status.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flag-status.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Show me all the half-staff events for US flags in the past year.
Can you list the half-staff events for state flags over the last 365 days?
